General.Name: Mandala Multifinance Tbk
General.Description: PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk engages in the consumer financing activities in Java, Sulawesi, Sumatera, and Kalimantan in Indonesia. It provides motorcycle consumer financing services based on conventional and sharia financing, as well as electronic and furniture, and multipurpose financing services. The company was formerly known as PT Gracia Dinamika Multifinance and changed its name to PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk in March 1997. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jayamandiri Gemasejati.
General.Address: Jalan Menteng Raya No. 24 A-B, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10340
